item.title: ginger lemon shot
item.description: A shot to boost your immunity system. Preparation: Clean the ginger put this is a food processor until a fine paste. Bring water to boil, add the ginger paste and let it simmer for about 20 minutes. Mix the honey and lemon juice, mix it with the cooked ginger and let it cool down. Strain the shot and you are ready to serve. Enjoy!
